column5: How many hand held GMRS radios will be available for the G2G.  I have two, but will need one on shore with Moe.  Let us decide on a common channel.  I also have a hand held VHF radio.  I remember last year we were using channel 5.02.  Will that be OK this year?  John
I will see if I can find my 2 radios and bring them 5..2 sounds good to me
Did Terry just reveal his age?  Tony
Really...you didn't look a day over 50 Bud !  I'll bring my two radios..
I have one, don't know if it's a GMRS though.  It's a Motorola T5200 talkabout, needs batteries though.  I'll bring it just in case it works.  Maureen
I've got a couple I can bring.
